Name: Animal ownership
Description: This is a compound value type that contains information about individual animals and their owners.

Properties.Name: From
Properties.Description: The date this animal was acquired by this owner. If an owner possessed the animal multiple, non-consecutive, times, create separate instances for each.

Properties.Name: To
Properties.Description: The date after which this owner no longer possessed this animal.

Properties.Name: Animal
Properties.Description: The individual animal that was owned by this person or group.

Properties.Name: Owners
Properties.Description: The individuals or group that owned this animal for this period. Multiple simultaneous owners can be added by clicking the + button for this property.
